definition: to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"

sentences.english: His countenance was thoroughly good-humoured; and his manners were as friendly as the style of his letter.
sentences.chinese: 他和颜悦色，那风度就像他的信一样亲切友好。

sentences.english: She complained loudly to the owner of the store, who answered her mildly .
sentences.chinese: 她冲着和颜悦色答复她的店主大声抱怨。

sentences.english: The next-door neighbors are amiable people.
sentences.chinese: 隔邻邻人们都是和颜悦色的人。

sentences.english: She shows the same kind manner towards great and small alike.
sentences.chinese: 她对待大小人物一样和颜悦色。

definition: smiling wholeheartedly (idiom); beaming from ear to ear
to welcome sb with a smiling face (idiom)
see 嬉皮笑臉|嬉皮笑脸[xi1 pi2 xiao4 lian3]
to have a taut face/to pull a long face/to look displeased
neither haughty nor humble/neither overbearing nor servile/neither supercilious nor obsequious
